text: Ba Xudo savgand mexurand, ki naguftaand, vale kalimai kufrro ʙar zaʙon rondaand. Va pas az on ki islom ovarda ʙudand, kofir sudaand. Va qasdkori kardand, ammo ʙa on noil nasudand. Ajʙcuiason az on rust, ki Xudovu pajomʙaras az ƣanimatho ʙosarvatason kardand. Pas, agar tavʙa kunand, xajrason dar on ast va agar rujgardon savand. Xudo ʙa azoʙi dardnoke dar dunjovu oxirat azoʙason xohad kard va onhoro dar rui zamin na dustdore xohad ʙud va na madadkore
